breakfast.title: Egg Bruschetta with tomato
breakfast.items: 2 whole meal slices ,2 whole eggs ,10ml vegetable oil ,6 cherry tomatoes ,15g Parmesan
breakfast.directions: . In a bowl, beat the egg, and then combine egg, cheese and salt.2. Dip the bread slices into the egg mixture.3. Place 10ml oil in a pan and put the bread slices to fry for 2 mins each side. Then remove bread and set aside.4. Place the garlic, and tomatoes on the pan and cook for 3 mins while stirring occasionally. Add the remaining mixture of the egg and continue stirring5. Top the bread with the cherry tomato mixture and sprinkle the fresh basil.6. Top off with salt and pepper if desired.
breakfast.tip: If you prefer to prepare this meal any other way, feel free, as long as you keep with the ingredients amounts! 😊

lunch.title: Chickpea pesto Pasta salad
lunch.items: 80g Raw whole meal pasta ,150g Canned chickpeas ,50g Pesto ,6 Chopped Cherry tomatoes ,20g Parmesan
lunch.directions: 1.Cook pasta according to packet instructions2.When cooked, mix pasta with the rest of the ingredients and serve

dinner.title: Mexican tofu with avocado and broccoli
dinner.items: 230g Firm tofu ,1 Medium avocado ,130g Chopped broccoli ,18ml vegetable oil ,40g Sour cream ,1 tsp cilantro ,1 tsp chili powder ,1 tbsp lemon/lime juice ,
dinner.directions: 1.Place 18 ml of vegetable oil in a pan and cook the tofu and chopped broccoli on medium/high heat until golden.2.Serve the tofu and broccoli mix with sliced avocado, cilantro, lime/lemon juice and chili powder.3.Place sour cream and serve

snack1.title: Cereal
snack1.items: 45g Weetabix Protein crunch cereal Chocolate ,220ml Whole milk

snack2.title: Dark Chocolate
snack2.directions: 1.You can enjoy this snack with some tea/coffee with a splash of skimmed milk and sweetener (optional)

breakfast.title: Overnight Vanilla, Banana & chocolate chip oats
breakfast.items: 40g plain quaker oats ,150g low fat vanilla yogurt ,1  medium banana ,1 levelled tbsp chocolate chips
breakfast.directions: From the night before, in a jar, mix the oats, vanilla yogurt, banana & chocolate chipRefrigerate overnight and serve in the morning

lunch.title: Chicken Wrap
lunch.items: 1 large tortilla wrap (80g) ,120g Chopped Chicken breast (weighed raw) ,60g Canned chickpeas ,20g Mayonnaise ,5 cherry tomatoes ,17ml Vegetable oil  ,Salt, pepper and paprika
lunch.directions: 1.Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper and smoked paprika.2.Place 17ml vegetable oil in a medium/high heat pan and cook the chicken3.In a bowl, mix the chopped cooked chicken, mayonnaise, cherry tomatoes and chickpeas.4.Place mixture in a wrap and either serve toasted if preferred

dinner.title: Chickpea avocado rice salad
dinner.items: 70g uncooked basmati rice ,90g Canned chickpeas ,22.5 Salad cream ,½ avocado ,10 cherry tomatoes ,15ml vegetable oil
dinner.directions: 1.Boil the basmati rice as instructed by packet.2.Place 15ml of vegetable oil in a medium high heat pan, place the chickpeas and let to cook for 3 mins and then add the chopped cherry tomatoes and the cooked rice.3.Place the mixture in a plate and top off with the avocado and salad cream.

snack1.title: Roasted chickpeas
snack1.directions: 1.In a bowl, mix 15ml of vegetable oil on the chickpeas and add salt, pepper and seasoning of choice2.Spread evenly on a dish and cook for a few mins in the oven on medium high heat.

snack2.title: Ricotta on open toast
snack2.items: 2 slice wholemeal bread ,50g Ricotta ,10ml olive oil ,5 cherry tomatoes ,Salt, pepper & Chilli flakes
snack2.directions: 1.Toast the bread and top with ricotta and cherry tomatoes2.Drizzle with the olive oil (accurately measured) and sprinkle with salt, pepper and some chilli flakes (optional)

breakfast.title: Apple Pie & walnut Greek yogurt
breakfast.items: 170g 10% fat Greek yogurt ,1 medium finely chopped apple (preferably with skin)15g Honey ,12g Walnuts ,¼ tsp cinnamon
breakfast.directions: 1. Mix all ingredients together and serve!

lunch.title: Chicken & Broccoli Couscous
lunch.items: 180g Uncooked chicken breast ,75g uncooked couscous ,130g chopped broccoli ,12 chopped almonds ,15ml vegetable oilSalt & pepper
lunch.directions: 1.Cook the couscous according to packet instructions2.Season chopped chicken breast with salt and pepper.3.Meanwhile, Place 15ml of vegetable oil in a medium high heat.4.Place the chopped almonds on the pan and cook for 2/3 mins while stirring occasionally. Put almonds to the side and cook the chicken breast.5.When chicken breast is almost cooked, add in the pan the cooked quinoa, chopped broccoli (you can boil/steam the broccoli if you prefer it to be softer), the almonds and cook for 2/3 mins while occasionally stirring.6.Serve 😊

dinner.title: Beef quinoa and vegetables
dinner.items: 155g Lean minced beef ,75g quinoa ,130g  chopped Broccoli ,140g Finely chopped carrots15 ml Vegetable oilSalt, pepper and smoked paprika
dinner.directions: 1.Cook the quinoa as stated by packet instructions2. Meanwhile place 15ml of vegetable oil in a medium/high heat pan and let the finely chopped carrots to cook for 2 mins, then add the beef and broccoli and let it cook for 4 mins.3.Add the cooked quinoa in the pan with the rest of the ingredients and let to cook for another minute while stirring occasionally.

snack2.title: Flavoured Greek Yogurt, Cereal & banana
snack2.items: 1 small pot 0% fat Flavoured Delta Greek yogurt (Coffee flavour is our favourite!) ,50g Blue berries ,1 medium banana

lunch.title: Shrimp rice and vegetables
lunch.items: 200g uncooked shrimps ,75g Uncooked basmati rice ,½ medium avocado ,40g Canned chickpeas ,110g Broccoli ,12g garlic butter
lunch.directions: 1.Boil the chopped broccoli for a few mins2.Meanwhile, Place pan in a medium high heat and add the garlic butter3.Add the shrimps and chickpeas into the pan and let to cook for 3-4 mins while stirring occasionally. Then add the broccoli, cooked rice and avocado and continue stirring.4.Serve 😊

dinner.title: Traditional Maltese bread with Tuna
dinner.items: 100g Maltese bread ,52g Rio Mare tuna in olive oil (Properly drained!)60g fresh gbejna in water ,50g canned white beans ,30g Kunserva6 black olives ,Garlic, onion and rucola/leafy greens!
dinner.directions: Mix all ingredients (except the bread) in a bowlTop the mixture on toasted (optional) Maltese bread.

snack1.title: Protein Bar

snack2.title: Yogurt, Banana & oats

breakfast.title: Greek Yogurt, peanut butter & Banana
breakfast.items: 170g 10% Greek yogurt ,1 medium Banana ,17g leveled Peanut butter
breakfast.directions: 1. Chop medium banana in a bowl and mix with 170g 10% fat Greek yogurt in a bowl.2. Add 17g of peanut butter

lunch.title: Salmon with Rice and vegetables
lunch.items: 125g Salmon fillet (1 findus fillet) ,70g whole meal rice5 cherry tomatoes ,30g Feta Cheese ,1 boiled egg ,30g Canned Red kidney beans ,100g broccoli
lunch.directions: 1. Pre-heat grill to high heat2. Sprinkle some salt, pepper and paprika and grill salmon for 2-3 mins each side.3. Boil broccoli for a few mins4. Boil egg of 8 mins.5. Cook 70g whole meal rice and combine the cherry tomatoes, feta cheese and red kidney beans together and serve along the Salmon fillet

dinner.title: Beef with Potatoes and vegetables
dinner.items: 160g Lean beef strips ,250g White potato ,1 cup chopped broccoli ,1 cup chopped cauliflower25g Parmesan ,12ml vegetable oil
dinner.directions: 1. Preheat the grill to high heat and add 12ml vegetable oil2. Sprinkle the beef strips generously with salt and pepper and put in the pan to cook3. After 3 mins, add the chopped broccoli and cauliflower together with the beef strips and cook for another 3 mins or until cooked to your liking4. White potato can be boiled, cooked in an airfryer or in the oven. Use salt and pepper and choice of herbs to season.5. Serve all ingredients together, sprinkle 25g Parmesan on top and enjoy!

snack1.title: Yogurt, nuts& banana
snack1.items: 150g Flavored yogurt Benna light18 almonds ,8 cashews ,1 medium banana

breakfast.title: Cheesy omelet toast
breakfast.items: 2 whole meal slices ,2 medium whole egg ,30g cheddar ,½ medium chopped onion
breakfast.directions: 1. Heat the pan to medium-high heat, add some 1 kcal oil spray, and add the ½ medium chopped egg and let to cook for 3 mins.2. Beat the egg in a bowl, and add the fried chopped onion and mix. Add salt, pepper and herbs of choice.3. Put the mixture in the pan and cook for 1-2 mins each side.4. Toast the bread (optional), Fill the toast with omelet and cheese and serve.

lunch.title: Creamy rice & Tuna salad
lunch.items: 1 small can tuna in olive oil (rio mare) (drained) (52g) ,65g uncooked rice ,30g Feta cheese ,5 olives ,5 cherry tomatoes ,60g canned sweet corn15g Mayonnaise1 cup leafy greens½ bell pepperCucumber (add freely)
lunch.directions: 1. Book the rice according to package instructions.2. Drain properly the tuna from oil and mix together with all other ingredients. Ensure you weight the mayonnaise accurately 

dinner.title: Tortilla Pizza
dinner.items: 1 large tortilla wrap (80g) ,3 TBSP tomato sauce ,7 olives ,10 sliced peperoni50g Mozzarella ,18ml oil Oil ,Season with salt, pepper and oregano
dinner.directions: 1. Open a large tortilla and cover with 3 tbsp tomato paste.2. Cover with 50g Shredded mozzarella on top of the tomato paste3. Add the sliced peperoni, olives on top.4. Add salt, pepper and oregano on top and drizzle 18ml oil on top.5. Cook in oven for a few mins until cooked to your liking

snack1.title: Greek yogurt & Jam
snack1.directions: 1. In a bowl, mix the 10% fat Greek yogurt , 30g jam

snack2.directions: Spread the ricotta equally on the Ryvita crackers ,Top with chopped cherry tomatoes and sprinkle salt and pepper on top

lunch.title: Prawn, Avocado & Egg salad

dinner.title: Chicken & Hummus Wrap

breakfast.title: Peanut butter and banana Rice cakes

breakfast.directions: Spread the peanut butter on the rice cakesSpread slice banana on top and enjoy!

lunch.title: Fancy Chicken sandwich
lunch.items: 150g Chicken breast ,2 whole meal slice bread ,15g Butter ,50g Mozzarella Di bufola ,½ medium avocado ,5ml oil
lunch.directions: Slice and season the chicken breast generously with salt, pepper and smoked paprika (optional)Cook the chicken on medium high heat using  5ml oil for approximately 3 mins each side or until properly cooked.Spread 15g of butter (Properly measured and weighed) on bread, and fill the bread with the rest of the ingredients 😊

dinner.title: Salmon fillet & potatoes
dinner.items: 125g Salmon fillets ,250g white potato12g Honey ,15g mayonnaise ,15ml vegetable oil ,2 cups leafy greens or shredded lettuce
dinner.directions: Season the salmon filler with salt, peppers and paprikaCut the potatoes, boil for a few mins to soften a bit, put in a baking dish, drizzle 12ml vegetable oil, add salt, pepper and herbs of choice and let to cook.Put a pan on medium high heat, cook the salmon using 1 kcal sprayIn a small bowl, mix the honey and mayonnaise and then use a dipping sauceServe along leafy greens 😊

snack1.title: Small platter

snack2.title: Halo Top ice-cream , fruit

breakfast.title: Omelette with garlic butter
breakfast.items: 3 Whole medium eggs ,18g Garlic butter ,50g Mushrooms ,50g bell pepper ,
breakfast.directions: Put a pan on medium high heat, add the accurately measured garlic butter on the pan and when molten, add the chopped bell peppers and chopped onionsLet bell peppers to cook for 2 mins, then add mushroom to cook together with the bell pepper and onion. Cook for another 3 minsIn a bowl, mix the 3 whole eggs together with the contents of the pan and mix well.Cook whole egg mixture again on the pan for 2 mins each side.

lunch.title: Healthy Chicken Caeser Salad
lunch.items: 120g Uncooked chopped chicken breast ,25g Parmesan Cheese ,25g Caeser dressing40g Collar bacon ,15 Walnuts ,1 slice whole meal bread ,2 cups shredded lettuce/ leafy greens ,8 Cherry tomatoes ,60 g bell pepper ,12ml vegetable oilSalt, pepper and seasoning of choice
lunch.directions: Season the chicken breast and cook on medium high heat on a pan using 12ml vegetable oilCook the chopped bacon.In a bowl, spread out the leafy greens, and top it up with the cooked chicken and bacon. Add the cherry tomatoes, walnuts bell peppers and the caeser dressing. And sprinkle the parmesan cheeseToast the whole meal bread and cut into cubes and serve with salad as croutons style.

dinner.title: Turkey stuffed bell peppers
dinner.items: 110g Uncooked minced turkey ,50g uncooked basmati rice ,2 Whole bell pepper (seeds and top removed)200ml Tomato sauce ,25g Shredded Cheddar ,½  shredded medium onion  ,12ml vegetable oilSalt, pepper and smoked paprika
dinner.directions: Cook the basmati rice according to packet instructions.Meanwhile, Put 12ml vegetable oil on a medium high heat pan, fry the chopped onions for 2 mins, and add the minced turkey (seasoned with salt pepper and smoked paprika) to cook for another 4 mins while occasionally stirring.Add the tomato sauce in the pan and continue cooking for a 2 mins and remove from pan from heat.Add the shredded cheddar and the cooked rice to the mixture and mix properly.Stuff the 2 bell peppers by dividing the mixture equally. Put in a baking dish, cover in foil and bake in the over for another 25 mins.

lunch.title: Tuna Rice Salad

lunch.directions: Place all ingredients on a bed of leafy greens 😊

dinner.title: Sun dried tomatoes, mozzarella and spinach stuffed Chicken breast
dinner.items: 200g Chicken breast ,60g Mozzarella ,5 pieces sun dried tomato (not in oil!)8 large chopped olives ,1 cup spinach ,100g Broccoli ,100g Cauliflower ,15ml Vegetable oil
dinner.directions: Cut a pocket in the chicken breast, making sure not to cut all the way.Season the chicken with salt, pepper and garlic powder from both sides.Stuff the chicken with Spinach, Sun dried tomatoes and spinach, close and secure filling doesn’t fall out using toothpicks.In a hot pan, put 15ml of vegetable oil, and cook the chicken 2 mins on each side.Place the chicken in the oven and cook for an additional 20 mins or until fully cooked

snack1.title: Yogurt, Banana & almonds
snack1.items: 1 small pot Benna light flavoured/ plain benna yogurt ,1 large banana ,15 almonds
snack1.directions: Can be taken together, or separately. Listen to your hunger ques!

snack2.title: Turkey Ham sandwich
snack2.items: 2 slices whole meal bread ,80g Turkey Ham ,30g Cream cheese ,Some baby spinach leaves ,Some cucumber

breakfast.title: Mini English Breakfast
breakfast.items: 2 slice wholemeal toast ,100g Baked beans in tomato sauce ,1 egg ,60g Dew Fresh Collar bacon
breakfast.directions: Fry the egg and the bacon in 1 Kcal spray and toast the bread.Serve the baked beans, fried egg and bacon along side with the toast and enjoy

lunch.title: Chicken Coleslaw Wrap
lunch.items: 1 large tortilla wrap (80g) ,120g Chopped uncooked chicken breast ,20g Mayonnaise ,15g Sweet chilli sauce ,15ml vegetable oil ,5 cherry tomatoesPlain coleslaw mix (without mayonaisse)Salt, pepper and seasoning
lunch.directions: Season the chopped chicken breast generously with salt, pepper and seasoning (smoked paprika or bacon flavoured seasoning is our favourite!)Put a pan on medium high heat and place 15ml of vegetable oil and let the chicken to cookMeanwhile, do the coleslaw mix by mixing approximately ½ cup of plain coleslaw with 15g Mayonnaise and 15g Sweet Chilli sauceOpen 1 large tortilla wrap and place some leafy green, top it off with the coleslaw mix and the cooked chicken and wrap it up! 😊

dinner.title: Ribeye Steak with vegetables
dinner.items: 215g Ribeye ,1 cup broccoli ,1 cup Cauliflower ,60g Carrots (1 medium carrot)
dinner.directions: Season the Ribeye Generously with salt and pepperPut a pan on high heat, cook the Ribeye to your personal preference using 1 kcal spray. You can also BBQ the Ribeye without any oil at all! (Ribeye has a good amount of fat in it!)Boil the vegetables for 4 mins to soften them a bit and serve alongside with the Ribeye. You can “fry” the vegetables in 1 Kcal spray (or on the same pan where you cooked the Ribeye) if you prefer your vegetables this way!

snack1.title: Flavoured Greek Yogurt, Cereal & Blue berries
snack1.items: 1 small pot Flavoured Delta Greek yogurt (Coffee flavour is our favourite!) ,50g Blue berries ,25g weetabix protein crunch
snack1.directions: Mix all together. If mixture is too hard for your preference, add some low calorie milk

snack2.title: Chocolate Banana smoothie
snack2.items: 90g 10% fat Greek yogurt ,1 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder ,15g honey ,1 medium banana ,½ tbsp Chia seeds ,Add amount of water according to your preference
snack2.directions: Mix all ingredients in a blender and add water to soften and add volume to the mixture 😊

breakfast.title: Tofu Scramble
breakfast.items: 100g Hard tofu ,¾  Medium avocado ,15ml vegetable oil ,½ Onion ,½ tsp chilli flakes ,¼ tsp turmeric ,¼ tsp smoked paprika ,¼ tsp garlic powder ,Salt to your preference
breakfast.directions: Set a pan on medium high heat and drizzle 15ml of vegetable oil in itAdd the chopped onion and mix properly and immediately add all the spices and let to cook together with the onion for 2/3 minsAdd the diced tofu in the onion mixture and stir well until all tofu is covered with spices. Cook until tofu is warm throughout.

lunch.title: Chicken Pesto Pasta salad
lunch.items: 180g Diced uncooked chicken breast ,70g wholemeal pasta ,45g Pesto sauce ,15g Walnuts ,1 cup Chopped broccoliSalt and pepper
lunch.directions: Cook the pasta according to packet instructions. A few mins before pasta is cooked, add the broccoli let boil a bit to soften.Meanwhile, season the diced chicken with salt and pepper and cook on high heat in a pan using 1 kcal oil sprayIn a bowl, Mix the pasta, broccoli, chicken, pesto sauce (accurately measured!) and crushed walnuts and mix together.Serve and enjoy 😊

dinner.title: Grilled Salmon fillet with Rice and vegetables
dinner.items: 140g Salmon fillet ,60g Uncooked rice ,2 tsp coconut sugar ,1 cup chopped broccoli ,60g Carrot (1 medium) ,15ml vegetable oil ,Salt and pepper
dinner.directions: Pre-heat the grill to high heatBrush fillet with oil, salt, pepper and coconut sugar and grill for 2-3 min each side and set aside when readyPrepare the rice according to packet instructions and set asideIn a wok pan, put some cooking spray and cook the chopped broccoli and carrot, add some salt and pepper or seasonings of choice and let to cook for about 5 minutes.Remove vegetables from pan and serve alongside with salmon and rice 😊

snack1.title: Ricotta on open toast
snack1.items: 2 slice wholemeal bread ,60g Ricotta ,8ml olive oil ,5 cherry tomatoes ,Salt, pepper & Chilli flakes
snack1.directions: Toast the bread and top with ricotta and cherry tomatoesDrizzle with the olive oil (accurately measured) and sprinkle with salt, pepper and some chilli flakes (optional)

snack2.title: Yogurt, Apple, Peanut butter & Chocolate chips
snack2.items: Light Benna yogurt flavoured1 medium apple ,20g Peanut butter ,2 leveled tsp chocolate chips
snack2.directions: Cut apple in slices.Spread the accurately measured peanut butter on apple slicesSprinkle chocolate chips on topServe alongside with yogurt

breakfast.title: Egg and feta Toast
breakfast.items: 2 slices wholemeal bread ,2 whole egg ,35g Feta Cheese ,10 cherry tomatoes ,5ml oilLeafy greens
breakfast.directions: In a bowl, mix the egg white with the whole egg and cook in a medium high heat pan using 5ml oil (accurately measured)Toast the bread and top it with leafy greens, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese and the egg. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and chilli flakes (optional!)

lunch.title: Smoked salmon and Shrimp salad
lunch.items: 160g Shrimp ,60g Smoked salmon ,2 tbsp Sunflower seeds ,50g Sweet corn ,8 large olives ,½ medium avocado ,8 cherry tomatoes80g bell pepper ,80g cucumber ,15ml vegetable oil ,Salt, pepper and chilli flakes (optional)1 tsp lemon juice2 cups leafy greens or shredded lettuce
lunch.directions: In a medium heat pan, put the accurately weighed vegetable oil and cook the shrimps. Add salt and pepper and chili flakes (optional) and set aside.Prepare a bed of leafy greens on a salad bowl and top up with all salad ingredients including the smoked salmon and the shrimps and serve 😊

dinner.title: Chicken, Quinoa and vegetables
dinner.items: 180g Chicken breast ,70g uncooked quinoa ,50g Canned corn ,1 cup green beans ,1 cup broccoli ,1 tbsp oil (15ml)12 cherry tomatoes ,1 tsp smoked paprika ,½ tsp cayenne pepper ,¼ tsp cajun seasoning ,1 tsp stevia
dinner.directions: Set a pan on medium-high heat and put 1 TBSP (accurately measured) of oil. Put the chopped chicken (seasoned with salt and pepper) to cook for 3-4 mins and then reduce heat to low.Add the finely chopped tomatoes, corn, and all the spices and stevia and continue stirring.Add ¼ cup water and the quinoa portion to the pan and continue cooking for another 20-25 mins while stirring occasionally.Steam or boil the broccoli and green beans to the side and when done serve with the quinoa and chicken mix!TIP: You can add the broccoli and green beans mix together with the quinoa when you add water on the same pan if you wish to save on prep time!

snack1.title: Dark Chocolate
snack1.directions: You can enjoy this snack with some tea/coffee with a splash of skimmed milk and sweetener (optional)

snack2.title: Ricotta on open toast
snack2.items: 2 slice wholemeal bread ,50g Ricotta ,10ml olive oil ,4 cherry tomatoes ,Salt, pepper & Chilli flakes
snack2.directions: Toast the bread and top with ricotta and cherry tomatoesDrizzle with the olive oil (accurately measured) and sprinkle with salt, pepper and some chilli flakes (optional)
